title: HAX Accelerator
description: The HAX Accelerator Seed Program offers early-stage founders building hard tech startups a $250,000 investment, 180 days of collaboration, and a global founder community, with access to experts, investors, manufacturers, and supply chains. Founders collaborate with an in-house team of engineers, designers, and entrepreneurs across Hax Ventures locations in San Francisco, Shenzhen, and Tokyo**.** In the referral  indicate that you are from UC Berkeley in the referral section of the application, you will jump to the top of the line for first review. Apply by April 30.
